title-part.text: PROCESSING OF PIG-IRON, e.g. REFINING, MANUFACTURE OF WROUGHT-IRON OR STEEL
TREATMENT IN MOLTEN STATE OF FERROUS ALLOYS

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

title-part.text: Manufacture of steel in electric furnaces

CPC-specific-text.text: in an alternating current [AC] electric arc furnace
equipped with burners or devices for injecting gas, i.e. oxygen, or pulverulent materials into the furnace
in a direct current [DC] electric arc furnace
processing a moving metal stream while exposed to an electromagnetic field, e.g. in an electromagnetic counter current channel
in an electrically heated multi-chamber furnace, a combination of electric furnaces or an electric furnace arranged for associated working with a non electric furnace
with crater formed by down-melting of scrap or charge through electrode or lance
Manufacture of alloyed steels including ferro-alloys
with liquid or solid rest, e.g. pool, "sumpf"
General arrangement or layout of the electric melt shop

with introduction of alloying or treating agents under a compacted form different from a wire, e.g. briquette, pellet
by introducing material into a current of streaming metal

Treatment of slags covering the steel bath, e.g. for separating slag from the molten metal
